name: Hustle Side To Side Jump
description:
A game that exercises like a side to side jump on the touch panel.
Compete how many sets can be done in 30 seconds.

1. First, tap the start position with two fingers.
With two fingers, please tap inside the red rectangular frames.
2. Since the red rectangular frames move, 
please separate the two fingers from the screen
and tap inside the red rectangular frames with two fingers.
3. Please tap to cross the white line in the order of
center, left, center, right, center, left, center, right ...
4. Repeat the previous step.

*** Be careful not to break the device, by exciting too much.

*** Depending on the device, it seems that it may fail to recognize simultaneous multi-touch.
*** In such a case, you may improve your reaction by placing it on a desk, or by holding with hands and playing.
